channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Very Large Pot Hole still not fixed, 31st March
item.description:
When are you going to fix this pot hole. It's in a dangerous position on the roundabout
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Church Road, Longlevens, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Trench across road., 31st March
item.description:
Two trenches across the road are sinking fast. To avoid the dip, you now need to cross the central white line. Obviously it is now a case of avoid the pothole, but risk on coming vehicles. There are two trenaches that need immediate action. Why has this not been picked up by Highways road inspection ? All very concerning, when huge amounts of money are being wasted on a cycle path, when the roads don't get fixed.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A435, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Larger crater/pothole, 31st March
item.description:
Larger crater/pothole on junction to Thirlestaine Road. This is one of many on this road and it is a disgrace. Very poor road condition near the school too. Has been awful for some time. Please sort!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Thirlestaine Road, Naunton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
